overview: On the night of the 18th August, 2013, Barcelona's skyline was illuminated by the passing of Roses' Comet, a spectacle that will not be seen again for several hundred years. Six love stories that occurred over the course of the evening are played out in the movie as the comet draws ever closer towards Barcelona. Over the course of the night, each character experiences the challenges that come with opening their heart.
title: Jordi & Marc
